description: Calculates the time difference (in a specified unit of measurement) between two datatable columns.

input.name: reference column
input.description: The name of the column containing reference date/time values.

input.name: reference format
input.description:
Format tokens based on https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/.
Defaults to `ISO 8601`.

input.name: value column
input.description: The name of the column containing date/time values.

input.name: value format
input.description:
Format tokens based on https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/.
Defaults to `ISO 8601`.

input.name: difference unit
input.description:
The unit of time difference measurement.
The supported measurements are `years`, `months`, `weeks`, `days`, `hours`, `minutes`, or `seconds`

input.name: target column
input.description: The name of the column to which time difference values will be added.
